title: Does this picture show the grocery store in K.K.C. Hood?
subtitle: Santi, California, was associated with white extremist activity for years, gaining the city's name "Clanty."
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A photograph of a customer shopping in a grocery store appears during the Krona 19 virus epidemic, which was wearing a cover on his head similar to Ko Klux Klan.
